code: import{Button}from"@chakra-ui/react";import React from"react";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Prime(props){function handleclick(){if(isNaN(props.number)){props.isprime("error");}else{var isPrime=true;if(props.number>1){for(var i=2;i<props.number;i++){if(props.number%i===0){isPrime=false;break;}}if(isPrime){props.isprime(true);}else{props.isprime(false);}}else{props.isprime();}}}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:handleclick,mb:"5px",colorScheme:"teal",variant:"outline",children:"Prime Number"});}export default Prime;
